com.paypal.selion.platform.dataprovider.impl

Class XmlDataProviderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.platform.dataprovider.impl.XmlDataProviderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SeLionDataProvider, XmlDataProvider

    public final class XmlDataProviderImpl
extends Object
implements XmlDataProvider
    This class provides several methods to retrieve test data from XML files. Users can get data returned in an Object 2D array by loading the XML file. If the entire XML file is not needed then specific data entries can be retrieved by indexes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XmlDataProviderImpl(XmlDataSource resource)

        Specified by:

      • getDataByIndex

        public Object[][] getDataByIndex(String filterIndexes)
        Generates an object array in iterator as TestNG DataProvider from the XML data filtered per given indexes string. This method may throw DataProviderException when an unexpected error occurs during data provision from XML file.
        Specified by:
        getDataByIndex in interface SeLionDataProvider
        Parameters:
        filterIndexes - The indexes for which data is to be fetched as a conforming string pattern.
        Returns:
        An Object[][] object to be used with TestNG DataProvider.

      • getDataByIndex

        public Object[][] getDataByIndex(int[] indexes)
        Generates an object array in iterator as TestNG DataProvider from the XML data filtered per given indexes. This method may throw DataProviderException when an unexpected error occurs during data provision from XML file.
        Specified by:
        getDataByIndex in interface SeLionDataProvider
        Parameters:
        indexes - The indexes for which data is to be fetched as a conforming string pattern.
        Returns:
        An Object[][] object to be used with TestNG DataProvider.

      • getAllKeyValueData

        public Object[][] getAllKeyValueData()
        Generates a two dimensional array for TestNG DataProvider from the XML data representing a map of name value collection. This method needs the referenced DataResource to be instantiated using its constructors with parameter Class<?> cls and set to KeyValueMap.class. The implementation in this method is tightly coupled with KeyValueMap and KeyValuePair. The hierarchy and name of the nodes are strictly as instructed. A name value pair should be represented as nodes 'key' and 'value' as child nodes contained in a parent node named 'item'. A sample data with proper tag names is shown here as an example: 
         
     
         k1
         val1
     
     
         k2
         val2
     
     
         k3
         val3
        Specified by:
        getAllKeyValueData in interface XmlDataProvider
        Returns:
        A two dimensional object array.

      • getDataByKeys

        public Object[][] getDataByKeys(String[] keys)
        Generates a two dimensional array for TestNG DataProvider from the XML data representing a map of name value collection filtered by keys. A name value item should use the node name 'item' and a specific child structure since the implementation depends on KeyValuePair class. The structure of an item in collection is shown below where 'key' and 'value' are child nodes contained in a parent node named 'item': 
         
     
         k1
         val1
     
     
         k2
         val2
     
     
         k3
         val3
        Specified by:
        getDataByKeys in interface SeLionDataProvider
        Parameters:
        keys - The string keys to filter the data.
        Returns:
        A two dimensional object array.

      • getDataAsHashtable

        public Hashtable<String,Object> getDataAsHashtable()
        Gets xml data and returns in a hashtable instead of an Object 2D array. Only compatible with a xml file formatted to return a map.

        XML file example: 
         
     
         k1
         val1
     
     
         k2
         val2
     
     
         k3
         val3
        Specified by:
        getDataAsHashtable in interface SeLionDataProvider
        Returns:
        xml data in form of a Hashtable.
